core:process.core:name: GetTenderAmount
core:process.core:comment:
Generic get tender amount prompt process. Input fields are:-
PartialBalance - if specified limits the the basket balance due to be paid when partial tendering a split bill.
PayableTenderValue - the maximum amount that can be paid with this tender, as determined by the tender itself, e.g. the balance remaining on a gift card or account.
TenderAmount - the amount to be paid with this tender if known - if set there will be no prompt and this will be used as the tender amount, unless it exceeds limits.
EnteredTenderAmount - the amount as a string pre-entered before entering tendering - if set there will be no prompt and this will be used as the tender amount, unless it exceeds limits.
MessageText - if supplied, the actual text to use for the prompt, otherwise a message is determined from other values.
SuggestTenderValues - if set then additional 'quick value' buttons can be displayed, typically for a cash tender.
IsRefund - this tender is a refund.
ReturnOriginalTenderDetail - present if we are returning an original tender.

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: min(maxRedemption, min((balanceTenderValue == null ? 999999999 : balanceTenderValue), (limitedTenderValue == null ? 999999999 : limitedTenderValue)))
